thread.title: i seem to have hit a max object limit fairly quickly

comments.text: is this limit due to computer performance or is there a hard limit?
reminds me of the issues with manyland when you try to use too many dynamics or very big things in a viewable area.
i built a little hut and instead of creating the entire roof as one mesh, each leaf of the hut roof is its own object. i'm tempted to try to redo it as all one object,
but i worry i'll spend however many hours redoing it and it'll still have problems and then i'll pretty much rage quit the game.
quick description of the prob: objects are missing as a walk around the hut and only reappear as other objects dissapear.
you can set show if far away too, or show all, but it will cause lagg
try merging , hiding with fog, delete the parts ,that are not visible
yeah, i've done that for a few objects. that seems to work for them, but i''m not at a very ar distance with my hut. i'm within touching distance of it.
ok, i'll give that a shot. sigh, i hope that works.

thread.latestCommentText: ok, i'll give that a shot. sigh, i hope that works.
